table.name: civicrm_webtracking
table.comment: This table will hold web tracking parameters for event and contribution pages

field.name: page_id
field.title: Page ID
field.comment: Holds the id of the Event/Contribution page

field.name: page_category
field.title: Page Category
field.comment: Denotes whether the page is an event page or a contribution page

field.name: enable_tracking
field.title: Enable Tracking
field.comment: Denotes whether webtracking is enabled or not

field.name: tracking_id
field.title: Tracking ID
field.comment: Unique UAID provided by google analytics

field.name: ga_event_tracking
field.title: Enable Event Tracking
field.comment: Denotes whether event tracking is enabled or not

field.name: track_info
field.title: Track Info
field.comment: Track the event of users visiting the info page

field.name: track_register
field.title: Track Register
field.comment: Track the event of users visiting the registration page

field.name: track_confirm_register
field.title: Track Confirm Register
field.comment: Track the event of users visiting the confirmation page

field.name: track_thank_you
field.title: Track Thank You
field.comment: Track the event of users visiting the thank you page

field.name: track_price_change
field.title: Track Price Change
field.comment: Track the event of user changing the default price option

field.name: track_ecommerce
field.title: Track Ecommerce
field.comment: Denotes whether ecommerce tracking is enabled or not

field.name: is_experiment
field.title: Is Experiment
field.comment: Denotes whether the page is the primary page of a google analytics experiment

field.name: experiment_id
field.title: Experiment ID
field.comment: Unique experiment ID provided by google analytics
